targets.expr: ( sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_total_bytes{host=~"$host"}) - sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_available_bytes{host=~"$host"}) )/ (sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_total_bytes{host=~"$host"}) +1 ) != 0
( sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_total_bytes{host=~"$host"}) - sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_available_bytes{host=~"$host"}) )/ (sum by(host, name) (hp3par_cpg_total_bytes{host=~"$host"}) +1 )
sum by(host, name, provisionningtype) (hp3par_volume_used_bytes{host=~"$host"}) / sum by(host, name, provisionningtype) (hp3par_volume_total_bytes{host=~"$host"})
